snippet.title: Weeny Adventure - Retro Platformer
snippet.description:
Grab all the gems to reveal the hidden map in this cute little platform game.

Weeny adventure is tiny challenging platformer game in pixel art style like old-school game.

Your mission is run and jump to grab all the gems before time runs out to find the hidden map to win the level, your adventure journey is not easy because you will encounter deadly traps and dangerous monsters.

Game Features:
- 48 levels
- Retro pixel art platformer game
- Addictive casual platformer!
- 8-bit SNES inspired retro soundtrack

Available in Google Play Store:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.anatagames.weenyadventure
